titleStmt.title: Aien alētheuein, or, A brief account of one suggestion of the Romanist against The dispatcher dispatched. / By Henry Hammond, D.D.
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Royston, at the Angel in Ivy-lane,

notesStmt.note: First two words of title transliterated from the Greek.
A defense of Hammond's criticisms of Thomas White.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
